useBlack.title: Use Black to format imports added
useBlack.description: Enable Black formatter on imports added to the top cell

disableNotification.title: Show notification when PYFLYBY starts adding imports to notebook
disableNotification.description: Inform when pyflyby starts to add imports for the first time. Since this adds imports to the top cell, it may not be obvious to user

lockTimeout.title: The timeout (in sec) for when the import locks should expire. If a lock expires then the import will be skipped being added.
